LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote1: A small group of humans thought they saw something shiny in your colony and they want it. But we all know they're just looking for an excuse to smash something.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote2: Volunteers from a distant rival colony are coming to raid you. Fortunately, not too many of them, I would guess about tree fiddy.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote3: In the distance you hear: ... spear shall be shaken, shield shall be splintered, a sword-day, a red day, ere the sun rises!!!!! DEEEEEEATH.... DEEEEEEATH.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote4: It's raining men! Hallelu- oh crap.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote6: There are people marching towards your colony. There is no way to negotiate out of this. You just have to git gud and win the fight the old fashioned way.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote8: BUG PARTY! Inside the colony though.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote9: Looks like the last rejection broke {colonist}s heart.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote10: Guess who's back, back again, plague is back, on {colonist}
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote11: AHA! {colonist} got "sick" and is not able to work, I see...
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote12: Just a flesh wound! 'tis but a scratch! What do you mean by "Infection"?!
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote13: Knock knock. Who's there? Amos... Amos who? Amosquito.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote14: Have you ever wondered what the insides of your stomach look like? Well lou wonderland no more, gut worms are here to give you the wisdom.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote15: {colonist} will not be able to make leg day anytime soon.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote16: The amount of events that have to go wrong, for half of your colony to get the plague, is astonishing. What have you done to these poor souls?
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote17: A sneeze. A sneeze? A sneeze!! Get Down, someone is sneezing!!
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote18: At least the colonists have learned, that "licking your wounds" is not a literal saying. But at a price.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote19: Mosquitos are like family. Annoying, but they carry your blood.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote20: Looks like the 5 second rule is not a thing here. As you hear: "Hey, I can still eat thi...Hoouuwwéééh", you see half of the colony's stomachs turn inside out.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote21: Mama always said, life is like a box of chocolates. You never know what you're gonna get. For example, muscle parasites.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote22: The Black Death has knocked on your door. You didn't answer, so the grim reaper himself kicked down the door and left everyone a little gift.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote23: This flu outbreak is obviously "not" caused by "someone" not washing their hands. *cough* {colonist} *cough*
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote24: After a small stabbing contest has gotten out of hand, infections started to flourish. Why? Just why?
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote25: You know the saying: "The sinking of the titanic was a miracle to the lobsters". Well, congratulations. You just saved a starving swarm of malaria mosquitos.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote26: There are many wonders of the human body. Starting to recognize a person by the sound of them vomitting is however none of them.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote27: You don't need to work out if you don't have any muscles.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote28: I guess they didn't see that coming.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote29: The weather is clearing up, go outside and PRAISE THE SUN! \[T]/
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote30: Is god literally taking a piss or is this a blessing from the plant gods?
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote31: When thunderstorms thought they weren't getting paid enough, they went on a lightning strike
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote33: I don't care if it is summer or not, it is christmas time now!
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote34: Looks like we are getting 6-8 inches of hard snow. At least Ygritte is happy...
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote36: Some unnatural weather has just occurred. A rain cloud is hanging one meter over the ground. Your colonists can feel the rain being created on them.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote37: Someone in your colony has played a "prank" and charged up enough static electricity to trigger lightning strikes. I wonder who it was...
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote38: Is the moon blocking the sun, or is this the death star looking for a parking spot?
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote39: I did not want to think about this but... the visual green light you humans call "aurora", is actually just sun-snot.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote40: The RimWorld gods decided to give some feedback on your colony...
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote41: Ambrosia, or as Darwin's memoar said: "Dude, this fruit tastes like what weed smells like. No wait are you writing this down. No stahp".
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote42: Some form of alien just landed in the area. Closer inspection reveals it's a dead {material} alien. In fact it's just {material}... But I WANT TO BELIEVE.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote43: If someone throws a stone at you, throw a flower at them. But remember to throw the flower pot along with it.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote44: One of your plants caught the flu - looks like you didn't vaccinate them. Guess you have to pay the price for this now...
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote45: Shower thought: If the sun would be alive, would solar flares be kisses or a sneeze?
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote46: Volcanic winter is a reduction in global temperatures caused by volcanic ash and droplets of sulfuric acid and water obscuring the Sun. That's wikipedia's language for "DAMN nature, you scary".
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote48: And we gonna let it burn, burn, burn...
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote49: What do you call a dad that got frozen? A pop-sicle.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote50: What does a tornado and a divorce have in common? Someone is losing the house.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote51: You have my sword, and my bow, aaaaaaand 10 tornados which are heading towards you.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote52: {#male}Wild MAN?! TRIGGERED!!1{/male}{#female}Wild WOMAN?!! DID YOU JUST ASSUME MY GENDER!!1{/female}
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote53: The wandering wanderer wonders on the wonder of wonders. Oh how the wonder of wonders wonders.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote54: Chat decided {colonist} looks better as a {gender}.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote55: Against all expectations, {colonist} got better at {skill}.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote56: It is the day of the potato, time to party!!!
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote57: Let's beat the devil out of it - Bob Ross
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote58: One animal was targeted by a psychic weapon and was driven to madness.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote59: A herd of {animal} is on it's way to the abyss and will travel through the area.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote60: Did you know? A group of bears is called a sloth, but a group of sloths doesn't have a herd noun because they are too lazy group up.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote61: What sounds more real? A horse with a simple horn on its forehead or a long neck, fabulous fur and a giant axe on its forehead. You decide.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote62: You always wanted a pet? Or {amount}? Well, I guess today is your lucky day.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote63: Not sure if this animal knows what it has signed up for, but it has decided to join your colony.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote64: Who doesn't like yorkshire terriers? Just look at these adorable creatures! And a whole pack wants to sniff at your colonists butts, this must be paradise :)
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote65: A number of local {animal} has gone insane and want to ensure the survival of their species. They believe you want to hunt and eat them.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote66: Don't worry, they just want to cuddle... Or do they?
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote67: The RimWorld gods have touched your colony. {colonist} was blessed and will have a crumble of gods power.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote68: As the earth is trying to reject you, it sends some of the animals in the local area to kill you. Get ready.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote69: No no, I am definitely not insane, it is just the drone...
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote70: Every colonist gets the feeling when you've got an unknown song in your head all day, and then finally figure out what song it is.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote71: I have not lost my mind. Half of it just wandered off and the other half went looking for it.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote72: Honestly, I don't even play an active role in my life anymore... Things just happen and I'm like "Oh, is this what we're doing now? Ok."
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote73: Sometimes I question my sanity, but the unicorn and gummy bears told me I'm fine!
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote75: A chunk of a ship has crashed near the colony. It's amazing that those never seem to have any tech in it, just metal.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote76: Your {item} delivery is here! What? You haven't ordered this? Well, I won't take it with me again, it's your problem now!
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote77: All hail the RimWorld gods. They bless us with their gifts and we shall return it with blood.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote78: This thing looks venom-enal, we should go and check it out.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote79: 8-Ball, should we go and explore the ship part? Reply hazy, try again.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote80: Every colony needs a golden throne!
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote81: But first, let me take a selfie. *flashy-thinged*
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote82: I wonder how long it'll take until they try to flee from this colony...
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote83: Another colony sent a caravan out to explore, however, they forgot about it and they are now exploring forevermore.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote84: Some visitors are here and ever since they arrived, there is a weird smell of fish around them. Where did they get the fish from?
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote85: Today's special offer, buy one, pay two.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesQuote86: "Veni, vidi, VISA", I came, I saw, I did a little shopping.
